frontmatter.title: AdoptOpenJDK 11 Is the New Default
frontmatter.description: Effective immediately, AdoptOpenJDK 11 is the new default download option.
frontmatter.author: andreasahlenstorf

frontmatter.title: AdoptOpenJDK 8u252, 11.0.7, and 14.0.1 Available
frontmatter.description: AdoptOpenJDK is happy to announce the immediate availability of AdoptOpenJDK 8u252, 11.0.7, and 14.0.1, both with OpenJDK HotSpot and Eclipse OpenJ9. As always, all binaries are thoroughly tested and available free of charge without usage restrictions on a wide range of platforms.
frontmatter.author: andreasahlenstorf

frontmatter.title: Adopt OpenJDK Docker Images now Available!
frontmatter.description: We are pleased to announce the availability of the Adopt OpenJDK multi-arch docker images!

frontmatter.title: We're off to a great start
frontmatter.description: AdoptOpenJDK has certainly come a long way over the last few months!
